                      throws UserManagerException
        Description copied from interface: UserManager

      • createUser

        public User createUser​(String username,
                       String fullName,
                       String emailAddress)
        Description copied from interface: UserManager
        Factory method to create new User Objects based on provider specific implementation. User objects created this way do not exist in the provider's underlying data store until a call to UserManager.addUser(User) is made.
        Specified by:
        createUser in interface UserManager
        Parameters:
        username - the username for this user.
        fullName - the full name for this user.
        emailAddress - the email address for this user.
        Returns:
        the new user object ready to use.
